@madmanmgb
I attempted to encode Eyes Wide Shut several times with Gordian Knot and it came out as about 1.4 GB in two parts when I was trying for around 700 MB in one part.  So you might want to plan for a fairly big file, if twentyforty does do it (he has lots more skill and expertise than me, btw)
